name: Arabic Named Entity Gazetteer
short_description:
Arabic Named Entity Gazetteer (WIKIFANE_Gazet) is an Arabic "fine-grained" gazetteer that has been automatically compiled from the Arabic Wikipedia. This gazetteer is compiled using an xml tags such as <class_name>Arabic Named Entity</class_name>. Each line has an Arabic entity (UTF-8 encoding).
This release of WikiFANE_Gazet consists of 68343 entities categorised into 50 classes.

To use this corpus, please cite the following publication:
F. Alotaibi and M. Lee, "Automatically Developing a Fine-grained Arabic Named Entity Corpus and Gazetteer by utilizing Wikipedia", In Proceedings of IJCNLP, p392-400. Nagoya, Japan, October, 2013.

Author URL:
http://www.cs.bham.ac.uk/~fsa081/index.html
http://fsalotaibi.kau.edu.sa
